item.title: [brr] Key to the City
item.description:
Artifact

{T}, Discard a card: Up to one target creature can't be blocked this turn.

Whenever Key to the City becomes untapped, you may pay {2}. If you do, draw a card.

item.title: [brr] Keening Stone
item.description:
Artifact

{5}, {T}: Target player mills X cards, where X is the number of cards in that player's graveyard.

item.title: [brr] Mesmeric Orb
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever a permanent becomes untapped, that permanent's controller mills a card.

item.title: [brr] Mazemind Tome
item.description:
Artifact

{T}, Put a page counter on Mazemind Tome: Scry 1.

{2}, {T}, Put a page counter on Mazemind Tome: Draw a card.

When there are four or more page counters on Mazemind Tome, exile it. If you do, you gain 4 life.

item.title: [brr] Mystic Forge
item.description:
Artifact

You may look at the top card of your library any time.

You may cast artifact spells and colorless spells from the top of your library.

{T}, Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library.

item.title: [brr] Mox Amber
item.description:
Legendary Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color among legendary creatures and planeswalkers you control.

item.title: [brr] Millstone
item.description:
Artifact

{2}, {T}: Target player mills two cards.

item.title: [brr] Platinum Angel
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Angel

Flying

You can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.

item.title: [brr] Phyrexian Processor
item.description:
Artifact

As Phyrexian Processor enters the battlefield, pay any amount of life.

{4}, {T}: Create an X/X black Phyrexian Minion creature token, where X is the life paid as Phyrexian Processor entered the battlefield.

item.title: [brr] Precursor Golem
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Golem

When Precursor Golem enters the battlefield, create two 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature tokens.

Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell that targets only a single Golem, that player copies that spell for each other Golem that spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of those Golems.

item.title: [brr] Quietus Spike
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature has deathtouch.

Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, that player loses half their life, rounded up.

Equip {3}

item.title: [brr] Psychosis Crawler
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Phyrexian Horror

Psychosis Crawler's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your hand.

Whenever you draw a card, each opponent loses 1 life.

item.title: [brr] Pristine Talisman
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}. You gain 1 life.

item.title: [brr] Sculpting Steel
item.description:
Artifact

You may have Sculpting Steel enter the battlefield as a copy of any artifact on the battlefield.

item.title: [brr] Scrap Trawler
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

Whenever Scrap Trawler or another artifact you control is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return to your hand target artifact card in your graveyard with lesser mana value.

item.title: [brr] Runechanter's Pike
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature has first strike and gets +X/+0, where X is the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.

Equip {2}

item.title: [brr] Semblance Anvil
item.description:
Artifact

Imprint — When Semblance Anvil enters the battlefield, you may exile a nonland card from your hand.

Spells you cast that share a card type with the exiled card cost {2} less to cast.

item.title: [brr] Self-Assembler
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Assembly-Worker

When Self-Assembler enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Assembly-Worker creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [brr] Springleaf Drum
item.description:
Artifact

{T}, Tap an untapped creature you control: Add one mana of any color.

item.title: [brr] Soul-Guide Lantern
item.description:
Artifact

When Soul-Guide Lantern enters the battlefield, exile target card from a graveyard.

{T}, Sacrifice Soul-Guide Lantern: Exile each opponent's graveyard.

{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Soul-Guide Lantern: Draw a card.

item.title: [brr] Sigil of Valor
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Whenever equipped creature attacks alone, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each other creature you control.

Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [brr] Sundering Titan
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Golem

When Sundering Titan enters or leaves the battlefield, choose a land of each basic land type, then destroy those lands.

item.title: [brr] Staff of Domination
item.description:
Artifact

{1}: Untap Staff of Domination.

{2}, {T}: You gain 1 life.

{3}, {T}: Untap target creature.

{4}, {T}: Tap target creature.

{5}, {T}: Draw a card.

item.title: [brr] Sword of the Meek
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +1/+2.

Equip {2}

Whenever a 1/1 creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may return Sword of the Meek from your graveyard to the battlefield, then attach it to that creature.

item.title: [brr] Swiftfoot Boots
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature has hexproof and haste. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

Equip {1}

item.title: [brr] Well of Lost Dreams
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever you gain life, you may pay {X}, where X is less than or equal to the amount of life you gained. If you do, draw X cards.

item.title: [brr] Unwinding Clock
item.description:
Artifact

Untap all artifacts you control during each other player's untap step.

item.title: [bro] Haywire Mite
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Insect

When Haywire Mite dies, you gain 2 life.

{G}, Sacrifice Haywire Mite: Exile target noncreature artifact or noncreature enchantment.

https://m.facebook.com/MagicTheGathering.ct/photos/pcb.3698065343753341/3698063323753543/

item.title: [bro] Static Net
item.description:
Enchantment

When Static Net enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Static Net leaves the battlefield.

When Static Net enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life and create a tapped Powerstone token. (It's an artifact with "{T}: Add {C}. This mana can't be spent to cast a nonartifact spell.")

item.title: [bro] Mechanized Warfare
item.description:
Enchantment

If a red or artifact source you control would deal damage to an opponent or a permanent an opponent controls, it deals that much damage plus 1 instead.

item.title: [bro] In the Trenches
item.description:
Enchantment

Creatures you control get +1/+1.

{5}{W}: Exile target nonland permanent you don't control until In the Trenches leaves the battlefield. Activate only as a sorcery and only once.

item.title: [bro] Kayla's Reconstruction
item.description:
Sorcery

Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put up to X artifact and/or creature cards with mana value 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

item.title: [bro] Kayla's Command
item.description:
Sorcery

Choose two —

• Create a 2/2 colorless Construct artifact creature token.

• Put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control. It gains double strike until end of turn.

• Search your library for a basic Plains card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

• You gain 2 life and scry 2.

item.title: [bro] Siege Veteran
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

Whenever another nontoken Soldier you contorl dies, create a 1/1 colorless Soldier artifact creature token.

https://twitter.com/MTGNerdGirl/status/1587142358390362112

item.title: [bro] Loran of the Third Path
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Artificer

Vigilance

When Loran of the Third Path enters the battlefield, destroy up to one target artifact or enchantment.

{T}: You and target opponent each draw a card.

item.title: [bro] Tocasia's Welcome
item.description:
Enchantment

Whenever one or more creatures with mana value 3 or less enter the battlefield under your control, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.

item.title: [bro] Soul Partition
item.description:
Instant

Exile target nonland permanent. For as long as that card remains exiled, its owner may play it. A spell cast by an opponent this way costs {2} more to cast.

item.title: [bro] Platoon Dispenser
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

At the beginning of your end step, if you control two or more other creatures, draw a card.

{3}{W}: Create a 1/1 colorless Soldier Artifact creature token.

Unearth {2}{W}{W}

https://mtg.bigweb.co.jp/article/preview/BRO

item.title: [bro] Urza's Sylex
item.description:
Legendary Artifact

{2}{W}{W}, {T}, Exile Urza's Sylex: Each player chooses six lands they control. Destroy all other permanents. Activate only as a sorcery.

When Urza's Sylex is put into exile from the battlefield, you may pay {2}. If you do, search your library for a planeswalker card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

https://twitter.com/wizards_magic/status/1586788072988979200

item.title: [bro] Steel Seraph
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Angel

Prototype {1}{W}{W} — 3/3 (You may cast this spell with different mana cost, color, and size. It keeps its abilities and types.)

Flying

At the start of combat on your turn, choose flying, vigilance, or lifelink. Target creature you control gains that ability until end of turn.
